summary: Retextures the guards shields from every major city
descriptionHtml:
Retro Shield Pack

This mod changes the shields of guards in all major cities using a retro style.
This mod can be found at the following locations.
Whiterun, Dawnstar, Falkreath, Markarth,
Riften, Hjaalmarch, Winterhold, Windhelm, Solitude.

==Installation==
Drop the Textures folder into the Data Folder

==Uninstallation==
Delete the following files:
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\dawnstarsymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\dawnstarsymbol_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\falkreathsymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\falkreathsymbol_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\hjaalmarchsymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\hjaalmarchsymbol_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\markarthsymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\markarthsymbol_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\riftensymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\riftensymbol_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\solitudesymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\solitudesymbol_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\whiterunsymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\whiterunsymbol_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\windhelmsymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\windhelmsymbol_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\winterholdsymbol.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Stormcloaks\\winterholdsymbol_n.dds


==Credits==
Martin Purvis
